thread.title: Live Concert World announces Westmont Hospitality Group as Hospitality Partner of the Salim Sulaiman Live 2015 North American Tour
thread.title_full: Live Concert World announces Westmont Hospitality Group as Hospitality Partner of the Salim Sulaiman Live 2015 North American Tour - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Live Concert World announces Westmont Hospitality Group as Hospitality Partner of the Salim Sulaiman Live 2015 North American Tour
text:
SOURCE Live Concert World Inc.
Live Concert World, together with Salim Sulaiman, today announces Westmont Hospitality Group as the official Hospitality Partner for Salim Sulaiman Live, North America Tour in September 2015.
TORONTO , Sept. 24, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- World-renowned musician brothers, Salim Sulaiman embarked on their second North America tour on the 5th of September. During the tour, Salim Sulaiman together with the band of SSLive2015 will enjoy the warmth and impeccable service of Westmont Hospitality Group hotels, such as the Pan Pacific Vancouver, Fairmont Palliser - Calgary and Hyatt Regency Toronto. Westmont Hospitality Group is one of the largest privately-held hospitality organizations in the world.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150924/270667
With over 500 hotels from many respected brand names in the hospitality industry offering a diversified portfolio ranging from budget and aparthotels to mid-market business and large conference hotels to boutique hotels and luxury resorts.
'It is our pleasure to once again have the opportunity to host Salim and Sulaiman during their tour. We look forward to extending them a warm welcome and providing them with a memorable experience,' says Moez Mangalji with Westmont Hospitality Group. 'We are thrilled to partner with Westmont Hospitality Group for the second time on our tour of North America ,' says Salim Merchant . 'We spend much of our tour time travelling and rehearsing – Westmont truly make our short stays unforgettable - a true home away from home.'
The 'SS Live 2015 – North America Tour' kicked off in Dallas, TX on the 5th of September before making its way across major cities across the U.S and Canada including Memphis , Calgary , Chicago and Vancouver , culminating in Toronto, Canada on September 26th .
Live Concert World presents SS Live 2015 North America Tour with Aapka Colours and in association with Air India.
Live Concert World (LCW), established in North America with over ten years of experience in managing talent and executing live performance events ranging from international music tours and concerts through to film festivals across the globe. Past events include The Unforgettable Tour featuring Amitabh Bachchan, Abishek Bachchan, Pretty Zinta, Akshay Kumar and Aishwariya Rai and the production of concerts for Sonu Nigam , Asha Bholse, Vishal and Shekhar and Salim Sulaiman . Moe Jiwan, the Founder & CEO of LCW has lead the way in live entertainment productions, since his instrumental involvement in bringing the 12th International Indian Film Awards (IIFA) to Toronto in 20111.This year, Live Concert World is very proud to present, SS Live 2015, through which they are pleased to support Toronto's Agha Khan Park .For more information visit www.sslive2015.com
Contact Information:
Sakina Kara
Marketing Director
Live Concert World Inc.
sk@liveconcertworld.com
This release was issued through WebWire(R). For more information, visit http://www.webwire.com .
